title: Must Watch: Brandon Semenuk is back with his own Slopestyle vision for the REALM
content:
Support us! BikeRumor may earn a small commission from affiliate links in this article. Learn more.

There aren’t too many riders out there who could “reimagine slopestyle” in that way that Brandon Semenuk can. So when he and Lead Builder Justin Wyper (who can also throw down on a bike) had the chance to design and build a new slopestyle course of their own, it included four unique features that of course Semenuk made look way, way too easy.

As usual, the clip is a masterpiece of riding, building, filming, and music selection that makes it stand out. But we’ve come to expect that out of Semenuk edits, now haven’t we?
author: Zach Overholt
